command_youtube_lista: List the YouTube channels you are following
command_youtube_dejar: Stop receiving notifications from a YouTube channel
command_youtube_id_canal: ID of the YouTube channel to unfollow (use /youtube list to see IDs)
command_youtube_test: Post the latest video from a channel to test
command_youtube_test_id_canal: ID of the YouTube channel to test (use /youtube list to see IDs)
command_error: ❌ An error occurred while executing the command.
command_youtube_canal_error: ❌ You must select a valid text channel.
command_youtube_rss_error: ❌ Invalid YouTube RSS URL. It should be like: `https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xml?channel_id=UC...`
command_youtube_rssID_error: ❌ Could not extract channel ID from RSS URL.
command_youtube_ya_sigueindo: `❌ You are already following the channel **{{a1}}** on this server.`
command_youtube_seguir_success:
`✅ Now following channel **{{a1}}**!
📺 New video notifications will be sent to {{a2}}.

🔍 You can test the setup with: `/youtube test id_canal: {{a2}}`
command_youtube_lista_vacia: 📺 I am not following any YouTube channels on this server.
command_youtube_canal_test_error: ❌ The specified channel was not found. Use "/youtube list" to see the channels you are following.
command_youtube_canal_test_buscando: 🔍 Searching for the latest video from the channel...
command_youtube_canal_test_novideos: ❌ No videos found on this channel.
command_youtube_canal_test_noexiste: ❌ The configured notification channel does not exist or is not accessible.
command_youtube_canal_test_pass: ✅ Test successful! The latest video from **{{a1}}** was posted in <#{{a2}}>.
command_youtube_canal_test_nopass: ❌ Error testing the channel. Verify that the RSS is accessible and the notification channel exists.
YT_HelpEmb_descripcion: Here you will find information on how to use the YouTube commands.
YT_HelpEmb_Field_Value_1:
1. Go to the YouTube channel in your browser.
2. Right-click on the page and select 'View page source'.
3. Search (Ctrl+F) for `rssUrl` to find the RSS feed URL.
4. Use that URL in the `/youtube seguir` command.
YT_HelpEmb_Field_Value_2:
`/youtube seguir`: Add a channel.
`/youtube lista`: Show followed channels.
`/youtube dejar`: Remove a channel.
`/youtube test`: Post the latest video from a channel to test.
